short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark youtube gems for later with single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YT Bookmarks revolutionizes your YouTube experience, offering effortless video bookmarking in a single click. Seamlessly add your favorite videos, mark key moments within videos, and bookmark engaging YouTube Shorts for quick access. 

- Easily mark key moments within videos, allowing you to quickly revisit specific parts of your favorite content.

- Enjoy a dedicated space for bookmarking and revisiting engaging YouTube Shorts for quick and bite-sized entertainment.

- Prioritizing a user-friendly design, YT Bookmarks ensures a seamless and intuitive experience for quick and easy navigation.

- Keep your preferred content organized and easily accessible, revolutionizing the way you interact with YouTube videos.
